channel.title: Changing text from one class from the other
channel.description:
So I was making this program where you type out any text and when you press the compress text button, it opens a new frame saying your text. Now I got this far and I got stuck at where when I wrote my text, pressed the compress text button, yet it said the default text and not the text I wrote.
So I was just wondering how I can change the dafault text of a jlabel in one class from the other class.
Thanks in advance, Usman555

item.title: Changing text from one class from the other
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Well I believe that the simplest solution is normally the most obvious. I would just set the input text to a string, or a char array and then just have the other window show it.
